brDecisionText.para:
Page-oriented or IETP shall be included front matter which comply to S1000D-A-03-09-0400-00A-040A-A that are:
Title Page
LOEP/LOEDM
CR
Access Illustration / LOI
LOA - List of Abbreviation
LOT - List of Table (optional)
LOS - List of Symbols (optional)
TSR - Technical Standard Record (optional)
TOC - Table of Contents
LOASD - List of Applicable Standard Document (optional)
ACT
LOF - List of Figures
